title: Exact Recovery in the Geometric SBM
summary: Community detection is the problem of identifying dense communities in networks. Motivated by transitive behavior in social networks ("thy friend is my friend"), an emerging line of work considers spatially-embedded networks, which inherently produce graphs containing many triangles.
